main event: A bright yellow round object with a tail was observed in Crystal, Minnesota on 14 Aug 55.
interesting points: The object was six times the size of a pea held at arm's length,The object was bright yellow in color,The object traversed a major portion of the sky in an estimated 30 seconds,The sighting lasted for thirty seconds,The report suggests the object may be related to meteor activity.
sighted object: one round bright yellow object with a tail
